name: Bacon-Wrapped Chicken in the Oven
author: Zachary Hensler
summary: Chicken wrapped in bacon... Goes well with corn, probably other vegetables or bread, too.
ingredients: 4 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, pepper, salt, and onion powder together in a small bowl
Rub 1/2 of the spice mix over chicken breasts
Wrap each breast with 2 to 4 slices of bacon, depending on size
Place in a baking dish and sprinkle remaining spice mix over top
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is crispy and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 25 to 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
